snippet.title: The Night of the Inquisitor | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
A VHS/PS1 Survival Horror Experience! Play as Emilia, a young woman cursed by an ancient rosary, transported into the Realm of the Inquisitor, a surreal dimension filled with the ghosts victims of the Inquisitor himself. Solve puzzles, free ghosts, and escape the Inquisitor!

GET IT ON STEAM
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2417730/The_Night_Of_The_Inquisitor/

TWITTER: 
https://twitter.com/ZombieByteGames

MY GAMES: 
https://zombiebyte.itch.io

MORE STUFF:
https://linktr.ee/zombiebyte

DISCORD:
https://discord.gg/WMx6ac9HPn
